name: Zodiac (Agggron)
description:
This is a tile-based puzzle game made in Unity, modeled after Bejeweled/Candy Crush. For my first game I thought it'd be good to start simple! Here, players match up as many astrological signs of the zodiac as they can before time runs out.

Players can now submit their scores (on the Game Over screen) to an online leaderboard hosted on my personal web page, located here. See how you stack up! (EDIT: It appears to submit to the leaderboard you need play the version on my website since apparently the PHP doesn't work from Itch. Apologies! :( )
